author: China Uncensored
description:
Support Operation Take Back Christmas! https://www.givesendgo.com/takebackchristmas

Communist China has once again managed to slip deep into America’s national security system — this time by helping finance the purchase of a company connected to U.S. intelligence agencies.

In this episode of China Uncensored, Chris Chappell exposes how the CCP used offshore shell companies, state bank loans, and corporate proxies to quietly acquire Ironshore and Wright USA, an insurer serving members of the CIA, FBI, Secret Service, ICE, and contractors working on sensitive U.S. facilities.

You’ll learn:
🔍 How Chinese state banks secretly funded the acquisition
📂 What data the CCP potentially gained access to
💰 Why the U.S. failed to review the deal until it was too late
🏢 How CCP-linked elites still sit
title: I WISH China Buying US Farmland Was the Worst Thing
